mapper.select: SELECT goods_id, goods_color, goods_meterial, goods_size_weight, goods_size_height, goods_size_length, goods_size_width, goods_size_weight_unit, goods_size_weight_unit, goods_size_length_unit, goods_size_width_unit, goods_package_size, goods_warranty_year, goods_assembly_time, goods_warranty_year_unit, goods_assembly_time_unit FROM goods_detail where id =#{goodsID,jdbcType=BIGNET}
